articles.title: John Kubale
articles.contents:
John Kubale
          
          
          Home
          CV
          Publications
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              John Kubale
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            I’m a Research Assistant Professor at the University of
            Michigan’s Institute for Social Research where I lead the
            Social, Behavioral, and Economic COVID-19 Coordinating
            Center (SBE
            CCC). My research focuses on respiratory viruses
            particularly SARS-CoV-2, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV)
            and influenza. Specifically, I am interested in exploring
            the social, biological, and environmental drivers of severe
            respiratory illness associated with these pathogens.
            
            
            Education
            PhD in Epidemiology, 2020 | University of
            Michigan
            MPH in Epidemiology, 2017 | University of
            Michigan
            B.A. Liberal Arts, 2011 | Xavier
            University
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              John Kubale
